conclusion: Determine the optimal path for Xiao Ming to reach Xiao Zhang, minimizing total time.
Use the principle of least time, similar to Snell's Law in optics.
Identify variables: \( v_1 \) (speed on beach), \( v_2 \) (speed in sea), \( \theta_1 \) (angle on beach), \( \theta_2 \) (angle in sea).
Optimal path ensures angles \( \theta_1 \) and \( \theta_2 \) minimize time.
Ratio \( \frac{v_1}{v_2} \) determined by angles minimizing travel time.
